about_the_game:
A Shining Light

“A Shining Light” kicks off our countdown of soundtrack previews, scene teases, and character spotlights.

Fight to Survive

Get your adrenaline pumping with “Fight to Survive,” an intense, fierce chiptune from Stories from Sol: The Gun-Dog.

Casting a Shadow

“Casting a Shadow” sets an eerie vibes - what starts as a routine assignment quickly escalates into a battle for survival as an unknown threat terrorises the crew of the Gun-Dog.

The Weight We Carry

Feel the gravity of every choice with “The Weight We Carry,” a track that echoes the crew’s toughest decisions.

Your New Orders

Feel the pressure of “Your New Orders,” where the crew wonders, “What should I REALLY do…?”

Darkness and Deliberation

“Darkness and Deliberation” sets a tense mood - make sure to think twice before you act, stay low, and keep calm.

More Questions than Answers

“More Questions than Answers” will leave you guessing what lies beyond each star.

Traverse the space, face the unknown.

Duty and Discovery

Enjoy your daily patrol with ""Duty and Discovery"". Mundane tasks but important duties!

Facing Down Fear

Confronting the unknown with “Facing Down Fear”.

More Stories to Come

There will be ""More Stories to Come"", that's for sure.

Title Menu - Stories from Sol

Experience this epic journey into the deep Jovian space and survive the mystery that awaits the JFS Gun-Dog in deep space in this retro Sci-Fi #visualnovel!"

name: Stories from Sol: The Gun-Dog Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 500 MB available space

short_description: This is additional content for Stories from Sol: The Gun-Dog, but does not include the base game.
